name: onspli/eladmin
description: Eladmin generates CRUD/admin interface for Eloquent.

suggest.illuminate/database: Allows using Eloquent as a standalone package.

scripts.docs:update: php sami.phar update -vv sami.config.php; cp -r docs-files/* docs/
scripts.docs:render: php sami.phar render -vv sami.config.php --force; cp -r docs-files/* docs/
